hymn.title: While we pray and while we plead

layout.singingstanza: While we pray and while we plead, While you see your soul's deep need, While our Fath -- er calls you home, Will you not to Je -- sus come? Why not now? Why not now? Why not come to Je -- sus now? Why not now? Why not now? Why not come to Je -- sus now?

lyrics.stanza: While we pray and while we plead, While you see your soul's deep need, While our Father calls you home, Will you not to Jesus come?
Why not now? Why not now? Why not come to Jesus now? Why not now? Why not now? Why not come to Jesus now?
In the world you've failed to find Aught of peace for troubled mind; Come to Christ, on Him believe, Peace and joy you shall receive.
